comments.body: folder `os_win` is compiled external dependencies, it has re2 and boehm pre-compiled. There is no easy way to compile them on user machine, I put it here temporary until I manage to write some installation script. I'm looking forward for your changes which are removing these dependencies for scala-native. So, then I don't need to write this installation script.

RE2 is on its way out, it's going to be superseded by our own reimplementation in Scala. Boehm is slightly more complicated as Immix is still experimental, and we can't remove the only stable GC we have just yet.

diffHunk:
